org.ncgr.blast

Class BlastUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ncgr.blast.BlastUtils

  • public class BlastUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    A set of static utility methods for running Blast and returning BlastOutput.
    Author:
    Sam Hokin

      BlastUtils()

    • Method Detail

      • runBlastn

        public static BlastOutput runBlastn(java.lang.String subjectFilename,
                                    java.lang.String queryFilename,
                                    java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> parameters)
                             throws java.io.IOException,
                                    java.lang.InterruptedException,
                                    javax.xml.bind.JAXBException
        Run blastn with some fixed parameters, taking two sequences and word size as input.
        Parameters:
        subjectFilename - the name of the FASTA file containing the subject sequence(s)
        queryFilename - the name of the FASTA file containing the query sequence(s)
        parameters - a Map of parameter names (without the dash) and values, both represented as Strings, e.g. "word_size":"8"; outfmt, out, subject and query will be ignored.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.lang.InterruptedException
        javax.xml.bind.JAXBException

      • getBlastOutput

        public static BlastOutput getBlastOutput(java.lang.String filename)
                                  throws javax.xml.bind.JAXBException
        Return a BlastOutput from a given XML filename
        Parameters:
        filename - the name of the XML file containing blast output
        Returns:
        a BlastOutput instance
        Throws:
        javax.xml.bind.JAXBException

                                  throws javax.xml.bind.JAXBException
        Return a BlastOutput from an XML file given by a URL
        Parameters:
        url - the URL of the XML file
        Returns:
        a BlastOutput instance
        Throws:
        javax.xml.bind.JAXBException

      • scoreDNASequence

        public static double scoreDNASequence(java.lang.String sequence)
        Return a double score for an input DNA sequence equal to the log of the inverse of the probability of each letter being produced randomly. The probabilities for each are set at the top. Longer sequences naturally get much larger scores.
        Parameters:
        sequence - a string sequence of DNA letters
        Returns:
        an integer score

      • combineDNASequences

        public static java.lang.String combineDNASequences(java.lang.String seq1,
                                                   java.lang.String seq2,
                                                   boolean useIUB)
        Return a combined sequence from two input DNA sequences, where mismatches are represented by their standard IUB/IUPAC codes if useIUB=true, or simply 'N' if useIUB=false. Returns null if sequences are not same length.
        Parameters:
        seq1 - string sequence of DNA letters
        seq2 - string sequence of DNA letters
        useIUB - boolean indicating whether to use IUB/IUPAC codes for mismatches; only N is used if false
        Returns:
        combined a string sequence representing seq1 and seq2 with mismatches represented by N; null if not same length

      • readBlastXML

        public static void readBlastXML(java.lang.String filepath)
                         throws javax.xml.bind.JAXBException
        Read a Blast-generated XML file (-outfmt 5) and spit out the contents.
        Parameters:
        filepath - the full path of the blast XML file
        Throws:
        javax.xml.bind.JAXBException
